Title: General knowledge about three types of attack educational wall charts
Publisher: Office of the National Civil Air Defense Commission (国家人民防空委员会办公室)
Notes: An 18-poster series, "General knowledge about three types of attack educational wall charts" (三防常识教育挂图), published in June 1983 by the Office of the National Civil Air Defense Commission (国家人民防空委员会办公室). The three types of attack are those with nuclear, chemical, and biological weapons.Titled "Strengthening pre-war preparations is an effective measure to crush the enemy’s biological warfare" (加强战前准备是粉粹敌人生物战的有效措施), the poster shows educational hygiene drives; encouraging healthy lifestyles; preventive inoculation; education; stocking up on cleaning agents and protective gear; and adequate health care.
